CHAR	ascii	morse			morse (hex)

L		0x4C	0110010100		0x194
M		0x4D	1010000000		0x280
N		0x4E	1001000000		0x240
O		0x4F	1010100000		0x2A0

Q		0x51	1010011000		0x298

T		0x54	1000000000		0x200
U		0x55	0101100000		0x160
V		0x56	0101011000		0x158

 		0x20	0000000000		0x000


Dot:  01
Dash: 10
Null: 00


Length of Dot:			 100ms
Length of Dash: 		 500ms
Space between dot/dash:  100ms
Space between letters:	 500ms
Space between words:	 1s
